contextId.information: In the king's dream the statue's head represents the king. AT: "The golden head symbolizes you" or "The golden head is a symbol of you and your power" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_symlanguage]])
contextId.quote: You are the statue's head of gold

contextId.information: This was not an actual leopard, but a symbolic animal that was similar to a leopard. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_symlanguage]])
contextId.quote: another animal, one that looked like a leopard
